ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T20:18:54 [Issue ID 4000-719949] urn:comicvine:4000-719949 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 01:55:09. [Issue ID 2252720]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Vampblade may have returned to her home reality, but things are far from back to normal. For one thing, how do you reunite with your girlfriend when you’re sharing a body with your alternate universe self… who happens to be straight?? For another, what’s up with all the new Glarkian space vamps!?
Features 3 regular and risqué variants, including cover 2 of 3 from the Elias Chatzoudis Amalgama variant set!!
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|----------------------------------------------------|------------------|------------------| | A | Regular Cover | Winston Young | 1 | | B | Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Winston Young | 2 | | C | Amalgama Set Variant Cover, Limited to 1000 | Elias Chatzoudis | 3 | | D | Risqué Amalgama Set Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Elias Chatzoudis | 4 | | E | Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 1000 | Zoe Stanley | 5 | | F | Risqué Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Zoe Stanley | 6 |
Note: Issue #42 in a series.
ComicInfo.Title: Home Sweet Home Part One
